structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
The Land Court And Registration Of Title To Land

law.catch_line: Registration Of Certificates Of Judgment In Writs Of Dower And Waste
law.text: If, in a writ of dower, judgment is entered confirming the report of the commissioners under section seven of chapter two hundred and thirty-eight, or if, in a writ of waste, judgment is entered that the plaintiff recover the place wasted, a certificate of the entry of such judgment may be registered as an encumbrance.
